data.text: Ao Awurade, woahwehwɛ me mu
Wonim mʼasetena ne me sɔreɛ;
Wonim mʼadifirie ne me nnaeɛ;
Ansa na mɛbue mʼano akasa no
Woatwa me ho nyinaa ahyia
Saa nimdeɛ yi boro me nteaseɛ so,
Ɛhe na mɛtumi afiri wo honhom anim akorɔ?
Sɛ meforo soro a, wowɔ hɔ.
Sɛ mede adekyeeɛ ntaban tu
mpo ɛhɔ na wo nsa bɛgya me akɔ,
Na meka sɛ, “Ampa ara esum mmɛkata me so
esum mpo nnyɛ sum mma wo;
Na wo na wobɔɔ me honhom
Mekamfo wo, ɛfiri sɛ woyɛɛ me anwanwakwan so a ɛyɛ hu.
Wɔamfa me bɔberɛ anhinta wo
wʼani hunuu me ɛberɛ a meyɛ mogya toa no.
Ao Onyankopɔn, wo nsusuiɛ som bo ma me!
Sɛ mese mɛkan a,
Ao Onyankopɔn, sɛ anka wobɛkumkum amumuyɛfoɔ a!
Wɔde adwemmɔne ka wo ho asɛm;
Ao Awurade, metane wɔn a wɔtane wo,
Menni hwee sɛ ɔtan a mewɔ ma wɔn;
Hwehwɛ me mu, Ao Onyankopɔn, na hunu mʼakoma;
Hwɛ sɛ bɔne bi wɔ me mu a,
